response.overview: When convicted bank robber Hank Tagert arrives home after his early release from prison, trouble is waiting for him. An outlaw gang is planning to "hoodwink" him into a dangerous stagecoach robbery. His ranch is about to be repossessed. His recent conversion is viewed with skepticism. Only his daughter, Amanda, believes in him. A western adventure with plenty of action, surprises and excitement. Illustrates the Biblical truth of Psalm 7 that "The salvation of the righteous is of the Lord." Filmed entirely on location in scenic Arizona. 76 min.
response.title: Hoodwinked
